solution_line_template: The total ratio representing the number of children in the family is {boys_ratio}+{girls_ratio} = <<{boys_ratio}+{girls_ratio}={total_ratio}>>{total_ratio}

From the total ratio of children in the family, {boys_ratio}/{total_ratio} represent the number of boys, meaning that the number of boys in the family is {boys_ratio}/{total_ratio}*{total_children} = <<{boys_ratio}/{total_ratio}*{total_children}={number_of_boys}>>{number_of_boys}
If the boys are given ${total_money} to share, each boy receives ${total_money}/{number_of_boys} = $<<{total_money}/{number_of_boys}={each_boy_receives}>>{each_boy_receives}
